title: Baked potato gnocchi, cavolo nero and pumpkin
description: Earthy flavours get a luxurious treatment in this delightful gnocchi recipe.Equipment and preparation: You will need a mouli and a foam gun and pellets.
ingredients: 1.25kg/2lb 12oz baking potatoes (such as Catriona or Spunta)
2 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for frying
2 leaves cavolo nero, stalks removed, cut into 10cm/4in pieces
400g/14oz pumkpin (such as Delica), peeled, seeds removed, cut into 1cm/½in dice
small bunch fresh chives, finely chopped
